rss.title: RSS
rss.description: I use Feedly to subscribe to several blogs, mostly tech-related ones. For more details about what I read, view the OPML file for my Feedly content.

pocket.title: Pocket
pocket.description: I use Pocket to save links that I wish to read later.

books.title: Books
books.info: I treat my reading list like a queue: first in, last out.
books.description: I occasionally still buy or get given books in "dead-tree" format. I track those through GoodReads on a "to-read" list.

kindle.title: Kindle books
kindle.info: I treat my reading list like a queue: first in, last out.
kindle.description: I use Kindle to read e-books on my phone or tablet.

films.title: Films
films.description: I have a home-brewed Plex-like media server setup at home that can talk to my Amazon Prime, Netflix accounts and personal files. I have the ability to add content to my list of things to watch.

tv.title: TV shows
tv.description: I have a home-brewed Plex-like media server setup at home that can talk to my Amazon Prime, Netflix accounts and personal files. I have the ability to add content to my list of things to watch.

videos.title: Videos
videos.description: I have a home-brewed Plex-like media server setup at home that can talk to my Amazon Prime, Netflix accounts and personal files. My home videos are mostly technical training videos.

podcasts.title: Podcasts
podcasts.description: I use PocketCasts to manage my podcasts. I listen to: 99% Invisible, BBFC, Freakonomics, Friday Night Comedy (BBC4), Song Exploder, This American Life and a few more.
